vulnerabilities.title: Improperly Controlled Modification of Dynamically-Determined Object Attributes in querymen
vulnerabilities.description: querymen prior to 2.1.4 allows modification of object properties. The parameters of exported function handler(type, name, fn) can be controlled by users without any sanitization. This could be abused for Prototype Pollution attacks.

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution in querymen
vulnerabilities.description: All versions of package querymen are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution if the parameters of exported function handler(type, name, fn) can be controlled by users without any sanitization. Note: This vulnerability derives from an incomplete fix of [CVE-2020-7600](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-QUERYMEN-559867).
